verses.roman:
kona mate rājā yadi more kruddha haya
tabe avyāhati haya, kariluṅ niścaya

synonyms: kona mate—somehow or other; rājā—the Nawab; yadi—if; more—upon me; kruddha haya—becomes angry; tabe—then; avyāhati—escape; haya—there is; kariluṅ niścaya—I have decided.
translation: "Somehow or other, if the Nawab becomes angry with me, I shall be greatly relieved. That is my conclusion."
